name: Evening Land "Seven Springs"
description: Silky and bright with cranberry, baking spice, and a clean mineral finish.

name: Savage Grace Pinot Noir
description: Lively red fruit and savory herbs with a fresh, lifted finish.

name: Domaine Dujac Clos de la Roche
description: Elegant and structured with red cherry, dried rose, forest floor, and a long mineral finish.

name: Frog's Leap Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Blackberry, cassis, and cedar with polished tannins and classic Napa balance.

name: Château Lanessan
description: Graphite, blackcurrant, and tobacco with a medium-bodied, food-friendly finish.

name: Terre Nere Etna Rosso
description: Volcanic minerality with sour cherry, smoke, and bright acidity.

name: House Rosé
description: Dry, crisp, and refreshing with strawberry and citrus.

name: Hidden Test Wine (should not show)
description: If you can see this on the menu, the show filter is not working.
